pages.text: 12|5|abeoji ileusidoe yaeya neoui hyeonmong-eul hyeongjedeul-ege yaegihaji mallageudeul-i neoleul eummohalyeo hal geos-ila sillo satan-eun ingan-ege jeog-inila

12|6|geulihayeo junim-i neoleul seontaeghayeo neoege kkum-eul haemonghaneun jihyeleul galeuchyeo jusigo eunhyeleul chungmanke ha sieo yagob-ui jason-eul beonseongke hasi ni ineun neoui du seonjo abeulahamgwaisag-ege chungmanke haessdeon geosgwa gat-eum ila sillo junim-on asimgwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-ila
12|7|sillo yosebgwa geuui hyeongjedeul-ui sosig-eun guhaneun ideul-eul wihan gyohun ila
12|8|geuttae geudeul hyeongjedeul-i malhadeolayosebgwa geuui auneun him-i sen uliboda abeojiui salang-i deohani sil lo uli abeojineun banghwanghago iss-eum ila

12|9|geuligo malhagil yoseb-eul salhaehadeonji animyeon meongos-eulo bonaela geu lihamyeon abeojiui eunhye moduga neo huiui geos-i doel geos-imyeo geuhu neohui neun jeong-uiloun baegseong-i doelila hani
12|10|geu gaunde hansalam-i malhagileul yoseb-eul jug-iji malgo geuleul umulsog-eulo deonjyeobeolila geulihamyeon jinagadeon daesang-i geuleul jueogalila
12|11|geudeul-i malhagileul abeoji yo seb-e daehayeo wae jeohuileul midji anh-eu sibnikka jeohuineun geuleul wihan chingudeul ibnida
12|12|jeohuiwa hamkke bonaeeo geuga jeulgeobge noldolog hayeo jusoseo jeohuineun geuleul wihan bohojadeul-ibnida hadeola
12|13|yagob-i malhadoe neohuiga geuleul meolli deligo gam-eun naleul seulpeuge ham imyeo ttohan neohuiga geuleul dolboji a nihal ttae neugdaega geuleul meog-eobeolilkka dulyeobnola hani
12|14|ittae geudeul-i malhagileul man-il neugdaega geuleul samkindamyeon jeohuineun han hyeongjelosseo sonsiljadeul-i doenaida
